channel.title: 2024年 on 记录每个瞬间
channel.description: Recent content in 2024年 on 记录每个瞬间

item.title: Data engineering at Meta
item.description: High-Level Overview of the internal tech stack

item.title: Hive MetaStore的实现和优化
item.description: Hive MetaStore的实现原理，Hive Thrift 客户端和服务端的实现，MetaCat对 HMS 的兼容以及优化，Spark调用 HMS 的逻辑

item.title: Analyzing and Comparing Lakehouse Storage Systems
item.description: 讨论了 LakeHouse 系统设计的难点，在不可变高延迟的对象存储之上，增加事务特性，三大系统都使用了OCC做隔离，事务实现都用了MVCC，源数据库管理delta和hudi用了表格式，iceberg用了层次存储(单节点处理)，数据更新三者都支持CoW(适合读多写少场景)，hudi和iceberg支持MoR(适合写多的场景)

item.title: 系统调优
item.description: 一些系统调优的排查工具汇总

item.title: Doris Advanced
item.description: Pipeline Execution Engine, Nereids-the Brand New Planner, High-Concurrency Point Query, Materialized View, Statistics, Join Optimization. Multi-catalog, Spark Doris Connector, Other Connector, Plugin Development Manual, CloudCanal Data Import, DBT Doris Adapter, UDF, cluster management, Data Admin, Other Manager, Maintenance and Monitor, Metadata Operations and Maintenance

item.title: Doris Basic
item.description: Introduce Doris,include: Data Model(Aggregate Model,Unique Model,Duplicate Model), Data Partition(Rollup),Index(Inverted Index,BloomFilter Index,NGram BloomFilter Index,Bitmap Index). Import Scenes,Import Way(Broker Load,Routine Load,Spark Load,Stream Load,MySql Load,S3 Load,Insert Into,Importing Data in JSON Format,Min Load Replica Num),Export,Update and Delete
